ISSUE.TITLE: Filer is not working properly with cassandra cluster
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I have 3 nodes Cassandra cluster and it's used by a filer server. I have configured filer for super large directories. If I take one of the Cassandra nodes down then sometimes read request on filer does not find the requested file until I restart the filer. After restarting the filer it works normally with the two Cassandra nodes and can find the file.
